long_description: The ERGObaby Performance Infant insert cradles your precious little one in cushioned softness. It provides crucial support for infants ranging from newborn to 4 or 5 months. Easily slip the insert into your ERGObaby baby carrier (sold separately) to keep pressure off baby's developing sacrum and provide necessary head and neck support. Large newborns that still need head and neck support can use the outer shell layer without the pillow. Small infants that have strong head and neck control but lack the height for correct positioning can use the pillow without the outer shell layer. The ERGObaby Performance insert is machine washable and CPSIA compliant.
short_description: The ERGObaby Performance Infant insert cradles your precious little one in cushioned softness. It provides crucial support for infants ranging from newborn to 4 or 5 months.
